entries.lesson: LR-4 filters = Butterworth squared. Frequency-domain via cuFFT optimal for GPU.
cuFFT wrapper with RAII pattern prevents memory leaks. Always pair cufftPlan1d with cufftDestroy.
Overlap-Save with 75% overlap (3072/4096) eliminates boundary artifacts. Store overlap_buffer between frames.
Google Test via FetchContent avoids manual installation. Placeholder tests allow incremental development.
